title: Classic Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
description: A timeless breakfast favorite, elevated with a silky poached egg.
steps: Toast the bread to your liking.
Mash avocado with salt, pepper and a squeeze of lemon.
Poach the egg and place on top. Finish with chili flakes.

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Salad with Grilled Chicken
description: A light yet filling salad packed with protein, veggies and herby flavor.
steps: Cook quinoa and let it cool slightly.
Grill or pan-cook chicken; slice thinly.
Combine quinoa, veggies, olives and chicken.
Dress with olive oil, lemon, salt and pepper. Add feta if using.

title: Lemon Herb Baked Salmon with Asparagus
description: An easy one-pan dinner with tender salmon and crisp asparagus.
steps: Place salmon and asparagus on a tray; drizzle with olive oil and garlic.
Season, add lemon slices on salmon.
Bake 12–15 minutes until salmon flakes easily.

title: Refreshing Mixed Berry Smoothie
description: A quick, antioxidant-rich smoothie that’s perfect on the go.
ingredients: 1 cup milk or yogurt (dairy or plant)
steps: Add all ingredients to a blender.
Blend until smooth. Adjust thickness with milk.

title: Healthy Avocado Chocolate Mousse
description: Creamy, rich dessert that’s naturally sweetened and nutritious.
steps: Blend avocado, cocoa, milk and sweetener until silky.
Add salt and vanilla to taste. Chill 20 minutes before serving.
